sentences.en: Descende, calve , ut ne nimium decalveris.
sentences.cn: 下来吧,秃子, 不然就剥掉你的头皮.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the value of epiphyseal extrusion index to choice of the operations Legg - Calve - Perthes disease.
sentences.cn: 目的为探讨骨骺突出指数对儿童股骨头缺血性坏死包容手术选择应用的实际价值.

sentences.en: The whales calve at this time of year.
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼在每年的这个时候产仔.

sentences.en: The whales migrate some 6,000 miles to breed and calve in the warm lagoons.
sentences.cn: 鲸会迁移6,000海里左右，到温暖的环礁湖生殖繁衍。

sentences.en: Their bulls gender without fail; their cows calve and do not miscarry.
sentences.cn: 他们的公牛交尾,无不成功; 母牛产子,决无流产.

sentences.en: To calve and therefore begin to produce milk.
sentences.cn: (产后)开始泌乳:因产犊而开始产奶.

sentences.en: When his cows calve each year he keeps one or two calves for his family.
sentences.cn: 他的母牛每年产犊时，他都给自家留上一两头。

words.tran_cn: [解剖] 腓肠，小腿；小牛；小牛皮
产犊（calve的过去式及过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to give birth to a  calf

trans.tran_cn: 生（小牛等），产（犊），使（冰川）崩解
